attributes.action: A Third Access Road for Canvey. Acknowledge the need for improved infrastructure
attributes.additional_details: To improving the quality of life for our residents and reduce the amount of traffic to enable the reduction of our carbon footprint.
attributes.background: For the government to provide the go ahead for the construction of a third access road off of Canvey Island to ease traffic congestion and enhance connectivity to and from the island.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about local roads are a matter for the relevant local authority, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
